casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

December 9, 2013

[Cite as 12/09/2013 Case Announcements, 2013-Ohio-5357.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2012-0497. Wolfe v. Grange Indemn. Ins. Co.

Stark App. No. 2010CA00339, 2012-Ohio-598. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Stark County.

Upon consideration of appellants’ motion to recaption appellee’s November 25, 2013 filing, it is ordered by the court that the motion is denied.
